content: the best of best dict extensions

great app!!!

keep up the great work!
This is a new staple. Incredible work!
It's a real extension in my dream. 这是我梦想中的插件。
The best translation extension I have ever used!
it's a really useful application, which helps a lot
it`s the most greatest translating tool.Thanks for sharing by crimx
It's my most favorite translate tool, thanks for the author's contribution
I have moved from Chrome to Firefox and still want to support this great add-on
Almost perfect for me. No matter license, Icon&UI, features and customizability.
This is the best translation software I have ever used.
AMAZING extension. It has everything that makes a dictionary add-on USEFUL and AWESOME. Thanks a lot Mr. Developer, I have finally found my calling!

It is the best dictionary I've ever seen! It's powerful and with many user-friendly designs such as adjusting the fold-size, changing the sequence of dictionary, selecting animation style and so on. Thank you very much!

I never write reviews for extension but I just have to write for this one. This is the best dict extension I've ever used. It saves me so much time in reading English paper and blogs. Highly recommended. 
这个扩展的超级棒，是我用过的最好的查词类扩展了。界面可爱，可配置程度高，功能也比较全面，能识别pdf里的词，强烈推荐！！
